basics.name: Gary M. Bleasdale
basics.label: Full Stack Shopify Expert
basics.summary:
The most recurrent characterization I've received is that I am a man who 'gets things done'.  I've worked across many different domains and projects, rapidly achieving successful results - this is possible because I care about what I do (I like German word 'Sorge' to describe this feeling), and am laser-focussed on improving my skills and on learning as much as possible. 
 I've been working as a Shopify developer for the past 3+ years, after spending 5 years in managerial roles in Programmatic advertising . During these three years, I've been lucky enough to work on, and lead, complex, high-impact projects, and learn from amazing colleagues in the eComm space.

work.name: ioasys
work.position: Shopify Tech Lead for Havaianas North America
work.summary: Responsible for all development work for Havaianas USA, including managing release cycle, new features for both Theme and Apps, Backend Integrations, Backend Extensions, Performance, SEO, Analytics, bug-fixes, CI/CD.  Also, offering technical support for other Shopify stores served by the company.
highlights: Appointed Tech Lead based on successful performance in two previous major projects.
Daily interface with the US business team, receiving requests, refining requirements, consulting, troubleshooting and providing timely updates on status and release timelines.
Architect solutions, with an eye on scalability, maintainability, extensibility and user-friendliness (both DX and UX) across both Themes and Custom Apps.

Project Management, by turning the result of the previous two processes into well-defined cards, and then supervising the progression of the cards to ensure adherence to deadlines and quality standards before release.
Hiring, managing and mentoring over four other team-members.
Still spend around 70% of my time actively contributing to Havaianas' various codebases, which include Shopify themes and custom apps, as well as configuring the store itself.
Recognized by the Head of DTC for Havaianas North America for significant improvements in development team responsiveness, speed, and release quality.

work.name: ioasys
work.position: Head Shopify Developer for Havaianas North America
work.summary: Main developer responsible for migrating Havaianas USA from Salesforce to Shopify.  Built a brand new theme for the brand, designed by renowned agency 1R, built the integrations with the mission-critical platforms like the ERP, PIM, Returns, as well as integrations with analytics and content platforms , and mentored the team of 4 who worked on this project, who were unfamiliar with Shopify.
highlights: Head Developer for the migration of Havaianas North America's eComm, from Salesforce Cloud Commerce to Shopify

This was a key corporate project, whose progress was tracked by C-level executives of Alpargatas S.A. (Havaianas’ holding company, + U$S 200 million in yearly revenue).  Upon completion, the project was directly recognized and praised by the global CEO, and by VP of North America
Played a critical role in knowledge transfer and project success by mentoring a team of three developers with no previous Shopify experience, accelerating their onboarding to the new Shopify store.
Led the development of a brand-new, mobile-first Shopify theme from scratch, collaborating with a leading LA design agency 1R to align with VBI and UX principles.

Architected and developed a configurable, embedded custom app which integrates and syncs mission-critical external systems with Shopify: Orders, inventory and prices (with SAP S/4HANA ERP), product imports and updates (with Akeneo PIM) and Returns (with Narvar).

Collaborated with senior management and stakeholders to determine viability of the whole project, define needed resources, define timelines, and outline the steps in a Gantt Chart for a successful migration

work.name: ioasys
work.position: Shopify Developer for Havaianas LATAM & APAC
work.summary: In-housed all Shopify store management and development, which up until that point had been done by an agency.  The successful in-housing of Shopify expertise within the company was a key factor in allowing the subsequent migration of Havaianas' two biggest stores, Brazil and USA, to Shopify.
highlights: In-housed all 10 Shopify stores which were being handled by an agency, initiating the creation of a hub of Shopify knowledge and expertise within Havaianas, which was critical for the later migration of Havaianas North America and Brazil to Shopify 12 months later

Transitioned into a direct role within Havaianas upon request from Havaianas LATAM's Digital Manager, assuming responsibility for the internal management and development of their Shopify platform, marking a significant career advancement based on performance at Buda Digital.
Selected by Senior Management to deliver a presentation on Shopify for a technical, non-Shopify-specialist audience, showcasing expertise and communication skills.

Served as the "go-to" technical expert for over 10 independent distributors in the LATAM region and integrated with the internal Havaianas interface for the APAC region, managing diverse workloads and ensuring a consistent brand experience.

Played a key role in planning the subsequent migration of Havaianas North America, collaborating with senior management and stakeholders to scope resources, define timelines, and outline steps for a successful migration.

work.name: Buda Digital | Shopify Plus Partner
work.summary: Offered client-facing theme development support, such as bug-fixing and feature-building, for various of Buda's clients, including Havaianas, Mahta and Queijos Ipanema.
highlights: Provided dedicated support for a diverse client portfolio, primarily focused on Havaianas Latin America (excluding Brazil), as well as VC-backed startups like Mahta.
Led the resolution of critical technical issues, ensuring optimal functionality and user experience across multiple Havaianas Latin America e-commerce platforms.
Served as the central point of contact for all Shopify-related inquiries, effectively communicating technical solutions to the Product Owner for Havaianas LATAM, Mahta, and other stakeholders.
